title: Steel Giant Nucor Confirms Data Stolen in Cyberattack
summary: Steel Giant Nucor Confirms Data Stolen in Cyberattack. America's largest steel producer initially disclosed the breach in May and took potentially affected systems offline to investigation the intrusion and contain any malicious activity....
content: America's largest steel producer initially disclosed the breach in May and took potentially affected systems offline to investigation the intrusion and contain any malicious activity.
